value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will see how Azure Data Lake Storage can make processing Big Data analytical solutions more efficient and how easy it is to set up. You will also explore how it fits into common architectures, as well as the different methods of uploading the data to the data store. You will finally examine the myriad of security features that will ensure your data is secure.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Data Lake Storage provides a cloud storage service that is highly available, secure, durable, scalable, and redundant and brings new efficiencies to processing big data analytics workloads.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn various ways to upload data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2. Upload data through the Azure portal, Azure Storage Explorer, or .NET. Or copy the data in Azure Data Factory.

images.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data. Find out how to use access keys, to secure networks, and to use Advanced Threat Protection to proactively monitor your system.

images.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage

value.title: Process and classify images with the Azure Cognitive Vision Services
value.excerpt: Microsoft Cognitive Services offers pre-built functionality to enable computer vision functionality in your applications.  Learn how to use the Cognitive Vision Services to detect faces, tag and classify images, and identify objects.

topItems.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Computer Vision API in Azure that allows you to identify facial details in pictures.

images.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

topItems.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

images.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service

topItems.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
topItems.excerpt: Create, train and test a custom image classification model using the Custom Vision Service to accurately identify paintings from famous artists.

images.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
value.excerpt: AI has the capacity to empower the whole world to achieve more. From empowering technical development teams to mobilizing an entire organization to unlock the true potential of AI, enterprises need to think strategically about AI – and they need to start today.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value

value.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
value.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

images.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs

value.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
value.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras

value.title: Putting it all together with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Putting it all together with Azure SQL

value.title: Secure your data with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Secure your data with Azure SQL

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to handle infrastructure and service failure, recover from the loss of data, and recover from a disaster by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability

value.title: Build a scalable application with virtual machine scale sets
value.excerpt: Enable your application to automatically adjust to changes in load while minimizing costs with virtual machine scale sets.

images.title: Build a scalable application with virtual machine scale sets

value.title: Caching and performance in Azure storage disks
value.excerpt: Moving data as fast as possible is good for business. Learn about disk performance in Azure, how caching can help optimize read and write access to storage, and how to enable caching to help optimize the performance of Azure VM disks.

images.title: Caching and performance in Azure storage disks

value.title: Characterize DevOps Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement
value.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement.

images.title: Characterize DevOps Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement

value.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage
value.excerpt: You will compare the different APIs available in Azure Cosmos DB, highlighting and contrasting the different scenarios that would make them a good choice for a company.

images.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage

value.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement text moderation with the Azure Content Moderator service.

images.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator

value.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
value.excerpt: Create, train and test a custom image classification model using the Custom Vision Service to accurately identify paintings from famous artists.

images.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service

value.title: Build a .NET Core app for Azure Cosmos DB in Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a database app to store and query data in Azure Cosmos DB by using Visual Studio Code.

images.title: Build a .NET Core app for Azure Cosmos DB in Visual Studio Code

value.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: Introduction to adding conversational intelligence to your apps by using language understanding (LUIS)

images.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)

value.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

images.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service

value.title: Create a multistage pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Design and create a realistic release pipeline that promotes changes to various testing and staging environments.

images.title: Create a multistage pipeline by using Azure Pipelines

value.title: Develop, test, and publish Azure Functions by using Azure Functions Core Tools
value.excerpt: Use the Azure Functions Core Tools to create and run functions on a development computer and publish them to Azure.

images.title: Develop, test, and publish Azure Functions by using Azure Functions Core Tools

value.title: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB
value.excerpt: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB

images.title: Distribute your data globally with Azure Cosmos DB

value.title: Explain DevOps Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality
value.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality.

images.title: Explain DevOps Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality

value.title: Explain machine learning models with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Many decisions made by organizations and automated systems today are based on predictions made by machine learning models. It's increasingly important to be able to understand the factors that influence the predictions models make.

images.title: Explain machine learning models with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore Azure services for performing data analytics, and explore the features of Azure Synapse Analytics.

images.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure

value.title: Export large amounts of data from Azure by using Azure Import/Export
value.excerpt: Evaluate Azure Import/Export to copy data from Azure Blob storage to an on-premises server. Create an export job in your Azure Storage account. Get the BitLocker keys to unlock the drives that you receive.

images.title: Export large amounts of data from Azure by using Azure Import/Export

value.title: Expose hybrid services securely with Azure Relay
value.excerpt: Securely expose services that run in your on-premises network to clients in the cloud, without having to open a port on your firewall or make intrusive changes to your corporate network infrastructure.

images.title: Expose hybrid services securely with Azure Relay

value.title: Make your application storage highly available with read-access geo-redundant storage
value.excerpt: In this module, you learn how to make your application storage highly available by ensuring that you can fail over resources if there's an Azure region failure.

images.title: Make your application storage highly available with read-access geo-redundant storage

value.title: Host your own build agent in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Learn how to use your own build agent when Microsoft-hosted agents don't meet your needs.

images.title: Host your own build agent in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS
value.excerpt: Create a DNS zone for your domain name. Create DNS records to map the URL to an IP address. Test that the domain name resolves to your web server.

images.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS

value.title: Identify security threats with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: In this module, you’ll discover how to detect and respond to threats with Azure Security Center.

images.title: Identify security threats with Azure Security Center
